title: Best ADC - Patch 6.14

embed.description: R reduces QWE cooldowns instead of amplifying auras. A bunch of other stuff. Trust us, just read this one. Things have been quiet for Sona over the past few seasons, so the sheer volume of changes here may look intimidating. In actuality, they all lead to one simple outcome: "Sona plays more music."

body:
So I am an ADC main at Silver 2 promos heading to Silver 1 and at 1-1.
I was looking for a strong ADC to play and main to climb fast, my goal is gold.
If you could base your votes around high silver-gold it would be great, Thanks in advance.

**Just pick which ADC you think is the best and maybe write your reasons for the pick or any other honorable mentions.**

replies.body: Ashe has the cc, aoe and damage to solo carry

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ctiXspFz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-17T10:26:52.959+0000)
>
> Ashe has the cc, aoe and damage to solo carry

Gonna play her in my next ranked game, my final game of my promos to silver 1
I picked Jinx because i believe if you are gonna climb you gotta carry yourself and she is just the best at doing that if your decent with her.

_> [{quoted}](name=Ravens,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ctiXspFz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-17T10:12:39.001+0000)
>_
 I picked Jinx because i believe if you are gonna climb you gotta carry yourself and she is just the best at doing that if your decent with her.
Im actually trying to play her right now, and will look to main her (if my ping gets fixed that is) she is my newest addition to my ADCs

> [{quoted}](name=Lika SunRyze,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ctiXspFz,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-17T10:17:36.011+0000)
>
> _> [{quoted}](name=Ravens,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ctiXspFz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-17T10:12:39.001+0000)
>  I picked Jinx because i believe if you are gonna climb you gotta carry yourself and she is just the best at doing that if your decent with her.
>

 Im actually trying to play her right now, and will look to main her (if my ping gets fixed that is) she is my newest addition to my ADCs

I pcked Miss Fortune probly because she's my go to ADC. Her harassment is really strong in lane, along with nice kiting with W and E. The ult can really wash away teamfights. As the game goes on, she does a tonne of damage mixed with the W attack speed buff. There are probly better picks, but for ease of use, I love MF

Weres the urgot option??! 1/10

Really there all pretty good options with unique advantages.

I think jhins a pretty good option atm if you take the time to learn how to play him

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ctiXspFz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-17T11:21:25.732+0000)
>
> Weres the urgot option??! 1/10
> 
> Really there all pretty good options with unique advantages.
> 
> I think jhins a pretty good option atm if you take the time to learn how to play him

I wouldve put urgot and teemo but there are only limited options

Twitch, as its the only ADC I like. He has a poison that stacks, a slow, a steroid plus invisibility, some extra damage based on poison stacks and his ultimate which can take out entire teams at once with its ability to pierce through multiple enemies, great in tight spots in the jungle. As Twitch you can go to lane and if only the enemy ADC or only the enemy support is in lane, you can easily sneak behind them and pick up a kill thanks to your steroids.
Please state your reason, it will help me lots :D
